entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 1:07 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with snow squalls late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Flurries or snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
